segment.source: The authors of this publication can not be edited because it has already been published.
The publication for this author could not be found.
Provide a formatted list of references for works cited in this submission. Please separate individual references with a blank line.
segment.target: 给文章提供一个格式化好的参考文献列表。请用一个空行分开个别引用

segment.source: New reviews have been submitted and are being considered by the editor.

Your submission has been uploaded and is ready to be sent. You may go back to review and adjust any of the information you have entered before continuing. When you are ready, click "Finish Submission".
Select the role that best describes your contribution to this submission.
Yes, I would like to be contacted about this submission.
Submit in any of the following roles if you would like to be able to edit and publish this submission yourself: {$managerGroups}
You must read and acknowledge that you've completed the requirements below before proceeding.
Thank you for your interest in publishing with {$contextName}.
Yes, I agree to abide by the terms of the copyright statement.
Please enter a valid CrossRef registration email. You can register your email for free on the CrossRef web site.
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的CrossRef注册电子邮件。你可以注册你的网站上为CrossRef免费电子邮件。

segment.source: Please enter your ISBNdb API key. If you don't have a key yet you can request one for free from the ISBNdb project.
segment.target: 请输入您的ISBNdb API 键，如有您还没有，您可以想ISBNdb项目申请

segment.source: Please enter a valid PubMed registration email if you have one.
segment.target: 如果您有一个有效的PumMed注册电邮，请输入至此

segment.source: Please enter a valid WorldCat API key if you have one.
segment.target: 如果您有一个有效的WorldCat API 键，请输入

segment.source: Please select one of the given citation modules.
segment.target: 请在我们提供引文模块里选择一个

segment.source: Don't use by default (will still be available to the editor)
segment.target: 请不要作为默认使用（这仍将被编辑使用）

segment.source: Internal error. A non-valid value has been posted for the 'optional filter' setting. Please report this as a bug.
segment.target: 内部错误，一个无效的值被提交给“可选过滤器”设置，请作为Bug提交这个错误

segment.source: For best results, authors should be entered in the following format: Coleman Jr, D. (Ralf) Dr.
segment.target: 为了达到最佳效果，作者输入必须按照如下格式： Coleman Jr, D. (Ralf) Dr。

segment.source: For best results, editors should be entered in the following format: Coleman Jr, D. (Ralf) Dr.
segment.target: 为了达到最佳效果，编辑输入必须按照如下格式：Coleman Jr, D. (Ralf) Dr。

segment.source: Please enter a valid article/paper title.
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的文章标题

segment.source: Please enter a valid publication title.
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的期刊（书）标题

segment.source: Please enter a valid publication date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的出版日期（格式为YYYY-MM-DD）

segment.source: Please enter a valid access date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的获取日期（格式：YYYY-MM-DD）
请输入一个有效的期数
请输入一个有效的卷数

请输入一个有效的版本
请输入一个有效的序列
请输入一个有效的补充

segment.source: Please enter a valid conference date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的会议日期（格式为YYYY-MM-DD）

segment.source: Please enter a valid conference location.
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的会议地点

segment.source: Please enter a valid conference name.
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的会议名称

segment.source: Please enter a valid conference sponsor.
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的会议主办
请输入一个有效的机构

segment.source: Please enter a valid first page (must be a numeric value).
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的首页（数字）

segment.source: Please enter a valid last page (must be a numeric value).
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的最后一页（数字）

segment.source: Please enter a valid total number of pages (must be a numeric value).
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的页数（数字）

segment.source: Please enter a valid publisher location.
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的出版地

segment.source: Please enter a valid publisher name.
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的出版社

segment.source: Please enter a valid ISBN (9 or 13 numbers).
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的ISBN（9-13位数字）

segment.source: Please enter a valid Print ISSN.
Please enter a valid custom publication ID.
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的定制出版ID

segment.source: Please enter a valid alternative link to the publication.
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的替代链接指向出版物.
请输入一条有效的评论
请输入一个有效的注释。

segment.source: Please make sure that you always set a publication type. Currently supported values are book (for books or book chapters) and journal (for journal articles). Otherwise the citation output formatting will not work correctly.
segment.target: 请确保您总是设置了出版物类型。目前支持的值为书籍（书本或书籍章节）和期刊（期刊文章）。否则，引用输出格式将不能正确工作。

segment.source: Please make sure that you set a valid title type. Supported values are 'abbreviated', 'translated', 'alternative' and 'uniform'.
segment.target: 请确保您设立了有效的题目类型。支持的值包括“缩写”，“翻译”，“二选一”和“统一标准”的。

segment.source: Part of title ignored while sorting
segment.target: 分类时忽略的标题部分

segment.source: Please only enter the initial characters of the title that should be ignored when sorting the title.
segment.target: 请只输入在分类时应予以忽略的标题的初始字符。
请输入一个有效的标题
请输入一个有效的副标题

segment.source: Please enter a valid part number.
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的部分编号

segment.source: Please enter a valid part name.
segment.target: 请输入一个有效的部分名称

segment.source: Please make sure that you set a valid name type. Supported values are 'personal', 'corporate' and 'conference'.
segment.target: 请确保您设置了有效的名称类型。支持的值包括“个人”，“团体”和“会议”。

segment.source: Enter each reference on a new line so that they can be extracted and recorded separately.
The following references have been extracted and will be linked to the submission metadata.

The authors are now not allowed to edit metadata when submission in stage {stage}.

segment.target: 您确认将永久删除这个附件文件?

segment.source: Typically used to identify the file format (e.g. PDF, HTML, etc.).
segment.target: 样稿标签被用于标识项目的文件格式(例如HTML、PDF等).
一个样稿标签是必须的.
一个样稿语言是必须的.
一个样稿语言环境是必须的.

segment.source: Please provide a valid remote URL (include http://).
segment.target: 请提供一个有效的远程URL（包含http://）

segment.source: No style sheet file has been added to this galley.
segment.target: 没有样式表文件被添加到这个样稿里.

segment.source: If you wish, you may enter a brief statement about the access rights held in or over this submission.
No editor has been assigned to this submission.
Is this submission derived from another resource? If so, you may enter a URL or description of that resource.
Include this contributor in browse lists?
Add additional information for your submission. Press 'enter' after each term.
Submissions in several languages are accepted. Choose the primary language of the submission from the pulldown above.

The submission type is usually one of 'image', 'text', or other multimedia types including 'software' or 'interactive'. Please choose the one most relevant for your submission. Examples may be found at http://dublincore.org/documents/2001/04/12/usageguide/generic.shtml#type
Please wait while your file is uploaded to the server.
segment.target: 请稍等，你的文件正被上传到服务器

segment.source: A name is required for this item.

segment.target: 给这个文件一个有用的名称

segment.source: You must enter a file name for this file

The name of the uploaded file resembles the name of a previously uploaded file, "{$revisedFileName}." Is this file intended to replace "{$revisedFileName}"? If so, select the file below. Otherwise, select "This is not a revision of an existing file" before proceeding.
Please select the file you would like to revise.
If you are uploading a revision of an existing file, please indicate which file.
This is not a revision of an existing file
Upload this file in my role as...
If you are submitting an Edited Volume, you should upload all volume chapters individually, under your role as volume editor.
After reviewing the assigned file, record any comments on the file below, and/or upload an annotated copy of the file (or another file).
Upload a File Ready for Publication
There are no files for you to revise at this time.
The submission must be resubmitted for another review round.
Submission has been resubmitted for another review round.
Waiting for reviewers to be assigned.
All reviewers have responded and a decision is needed.
New editorial recommendations have been submitted.
All recommendations are in and a decision is needed.

Users are assigned to stages of the workflow by user group. Any user assigned to this stage will automatically be assigned to other stages to which their user group has been assigned. This is commonly reserved for editors, authors and translators.
You are about to remove this participant from all stages.
You must select a user group.
You must select a user for the specified user group.

The participant you selected has been assigned to conduct a blind review. If you assign them as a participant, they will have access to the author's identity. You are encouraged not to assign this participant unless you can independently ensure the integrity of the peer review process.
Are you sure you want the authors of this submission to be unable to edit the submission's metadata at that stage?
Are you sure you want the authors of this submission to be able to edit the submission's metadata at that stage?
The page proof file must be checked as approved to be made Available. Do you want to approve it?
This file proof will no longer be publicly available for download or purchase. Do you want to disapprove it?
Assign an editor to enable the editorial decisions for this stage.
Recommend an editorial decision for this submission.
